comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
attached is a patch for lucene.

if no one objects, i'd like to commit this and make a similar patch for solr, which has the same problem.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: attached is a patch to fix the references on the solr site.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: both patches are committed... if you find any outdated references on the site or wiki please correct them

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body: backported the solr part to rev 941639

description:
The unversioned site needs to point to the new merged trunk.
Currently it points to the closed-off dead trunk in two different places.
summary: the unversioned site points to a dead trunk
